attributes.action: Shut Down LBS Enforcement - Wheel Clamping Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This company runs a private clamping and towing business that abuses the system and uses bullying tactics and unlawful behaviour to intimidate women who are usually alone into paying astronomical parking fines of anything up to £500.  Please click on the link below to view the stories of just a handful of people that have been charged hundreds of pounds unlawfully.
http://www.thisistotalessex.co.uk/billericay/BILLERICAY-Car-clamp-firm-spotlight/article-1509091-detail/article.html

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
